item.description: Setting this to True causes the OverlayHD Skin Manager plugin to always be active / available even if the skin is not currently selected. This allows skin settings to be changed any time even though they are only used when the skin is active. Setting this to False makes the plugin active only when the skin is active.

When enabled, the current screen name is shown on the top left corner of most screens. This can be used to identify problematic screens.
When enabled, the REC icon will be displayed blinking.
When enabled, the firmware update available icon will be displayed blinking.
When enabled, menus are shown with the numeric fast access button to the left of each menu item. (The numbers are always available even if not shown.)
